item.title: Cyberattack on Starlink
item.description: Within 7 days, a state-sponsored cyberattack will disrupt Starlink services in PNG. (50%)

item.title: Russia-EU Trade Surge
item.description: Within 7 days, Russia-EU trade will surpass $1.2 trillion USD, driven by sanctions evasion. (60%)

item.title: Protests in Minneapolis
item.description: Within 7 days, Minneapolis will implement a citywide curfew due to escalating protests. (70%)

item.title: U.S. Military Action Pause
item.description: Within 7 days, the U.S. Senate will vote to block Trump's military actions in Venezuela. (85%)

item.title: Canadian Trade Adjustment
item.description: Within 7 days, Canada will revise its trade agreements with the EU to mitigate U.S.-driven tariff risks. (65%)

item.title: Syrian Aleppo Escalation
item.description: Within 7 days, the Syrian army will shell Aleppo neighborhoods, causing ≥50 civilian casualties. (70%)

item.title: PNG Internet Disruption
item.description: Within 7 days, PNG will implement a temporary internet blackout in response to Starlink shutdowns. (55%)

item.title: Indian Market Volatility
item.description: Within 7 days, the Indian stock market will drop by ≥5% due to Trump's 500% tariff threat. (60%)

item.title: Danish Greenland Defense Posture
item.description: Within 7 days, Danish forces will conduct a joint military exercise with NATO in Greenland to deter potential invasions. (80%)

item.title: Venezuela Sanctions Escalation
item.description: Within 7 days, the U.S. will announce new sanctions targeting Venezuelan oil exports, reducing them by 20%. (75%)
